{"id":1309169935,"question_id":44,"lang":"cpp","lang_name":"C++","time":"2 months, 3 weeks","timestamp":1720082627,"status":10,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"74 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/1309169935/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Wildcard Matching","memory":"19.3 MB","code":"class Solution {\npublic:\n    bool allstars(string p,int i){\n        for(int j=0;j<i;j++){\n            if(p[j]!='*'){\n                return false;\n            }\n        }\n        return true;\n    }\n    bool isMatch(string s, string p) {\n         int n=s.size();\n        int m=p.size();\n        vector<vector<bool>>dp(n+1,vector<bool>(m+1,0));\n        dp[0][0]=1;\n        for(int i=1;i<=m;i++){\n            dp[0][i]=allstars(p,i);\n        }\n        for(int i=1;i<=n;i++){\n            for(int j=1;j<=m;j++){\n                if(s[i-1]==p[j-1] or p[j-1]=='?'){\n                    dp[i][j]=dp[i-1][j-1];\n                }\n                else{\n                    if(p[j-1]=='*'){\n                        dp[i][j]=dp[i-1][j]||dp[i][j-1];\n                    }\n                    else{\n                        dp[i][j]=false;\n                    }\n                }\n            }\n        }\n        return dp[n][m];\n    }\n};","compare_result":"","title_slug":"wildcard-matching","has_notes":false,"flag_type":1}
